screen_desc: The screenshot shows the home screen of a smartphone with a dark background featuring an abstract blue design. The screen displays the following apps: Gmail, Photos, and YouTube, along with a Google Chrome browser icon and a Google search bar at the bottom. There is also a Google Play Store app icon on the bottom right corner.
action_think: The user wants to shop on Costco and add a product to the cart. First, I need to navigate to the Costco website.
action_result: By pressing the home button, I have moved back to the home screen. This is necessary because to install the user required app, we must fine the App store first.
